ctrsmKernel.c

00032 
00043 #include "c6x.h"
00044 #include "ctrsmKernel.h"
00045 #include "defCC66.h"
00046 
00047 void ctrsmKernel(const complex *pA, complex *pB, complex *pC, complex *pBHat, const int k, const int stepC,
00048                 const int flagisN, const int flagisL)
00049 {
00050   __float2_t sum00a, sum10a, sum00b, sum10b;
00051   __float2_t sum01a, sum11a, sum01b, sum11b;
00052   __float2_t sum02a, sum12a, sum02b, sum12b;
00053   __float2_t sum03a, sum13a, sum03b, sum13b;
00054   __float2_t * restrict ptrB     = (__float2_t *) pB;
00055   __float2_t * restrict ptrA     = (__float2_t *) pA;
00056   __float2_t * restrict pRegA, * restrict pRegB, * restrict pRegBH, * restrict pRegC;
00057   __float2_t regC, tempd;
00058   __float2_t a00, a01;
00059   __float2_t a10, a11;
00060   __x128_t temp128;
00061   int_least16_t index;
00062 
00063   // zero out accumulators
00064   sum00a = 0.0;
00065   sum10a = 0.0;
00066   sum01a = 0.0;
00067   sum11a = 0.0;
00068   sum02a = 0.0;
00069   sum12a = 0.0;
00070   sum03a = 0.0;
00071   sum13a = 0.0;
00072   sum00b = 0.0;
00073   sum10b = 0.0;
00074   sum01b = 0.0;
00075   sum11b = 0.0;
00076   sum02b = 0.0;
00077   sum12b = 0.0;
00078   sum03b = 0.0;
00079   sum13b = 0.0;
00080 
00081 for (index = 0; index < k; index++)
00082   { // loop over k;
00083     // each iteration performs rank one update of 2x1 by 1x4
00084     // matrices of A and B respectively; result is
00085         // accumulated over 2x4 matrix
00086         __float2_t b0, b1, b2, b3, a0, a1;
00087         __x128_t   reg128;
00088 
00089         a0 = *ptrA++;
00090         a1 = *ptrA++;
00091 
00092     b0 = *ptrB++;
00093     b1 = *ptrB++;
00094     b2 = *ptrB++;
00095     b3 = *ptrB++;
00096 
00097     // the four partial sums are accumulated independently
00098     // a[0]*b[0]
00099     reg128 = _cmpysp(a0, b0);
00100     sum00a = _daddsp(sum00a, _lof2_128(reg128));
00101     sum00b = _daddsp(sum00b, _hif2_128(reg128));
00102 
00103     // a[1]*b[0]
00104     reg128 = _cmpysp(a1, b0);
00105     sum10a = _daddsp(sum10a, _lof2_128(reg128));
00106     sum10b = _daddsp(sum10b, _hif2_128(reg128));
00107 
00108     // a[0]*b[1]
00109     reg128 = _cmpysp(a0, b1);
00110     sum01a = _daddsp(sum01a, _lof2_128(reg128));
00111     sum01b = _daddsp(sum01b, _hif2_128(reg128));
00112 
00113     // a[1]*b[1]
00114     reg128 = _cmpysp(a1, b1);
00115     sum11a = _daddsp(sum11a, _lof2_128(reg128));
00116     sum11b = _daddsp(sum11b, _hif2_128(reg128));
00117 
00118     // a[0]*b[2]
00119     reg128 = _cmpysp(a0, b2);
00120     sum02a = _daddsp(sum02a, _lof2_128(reg128));
00121     sum02b = _daddsp(sum02b, _hif2_128(reg128));
00122 
00123     // a[1]*b[2]
00124     reg128 = _cmpysp(a1, b2);
00125     sum12a = _daddsp(sum12a, _lof2_128(reg128));
00126     sum12b = _daddsp(sum12b, _hif2_128(reg128));
00127 
00128     // a[0]*b[3]
00129     reg128 = _cmpysp(a0, b3);
00130     sum03a = _daddsp(sum03a, _lof2_128(reg128));
00131     sum03b = _daddsp(sum03b, _hif2_128(reg128));
00132 
00133     // a[1]*b[3]
00134     reg128 = _cmpysp(a1, b3);
00135     sum13a = _daddsp(sum13a, _lof2_128(reg128));
00136     sum13b = _daddsp(sum13b, _hif2_128(reg128));
00137   }
00138 
00139   if(flagisN > 0)  // final saving in Normal form
00140   {
00141         if(flagisL) // lower triangular
00142         {
00143           // read and update 2x4 matrix
00144           pRegC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00145           // c[0,0]
00146           sum00a = _daddsp(sum00a, sum00b);
00147           sum00a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum00a),-_hif(sum00a)));
00148           // c[1,0]
00149           sum10a = _daddsp(sum10a, sum10b);
00150           sum10a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum10a),-_hif(sum10a)));
00151           // next column
00152           pRegC += (stepC-2);
00153           // c[0,1]
00154           sum01a = _daddsp(sum01a, sum01b);
00155           sum01a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum01a),-_hif(sum01a)));
00156           // c[1,1]
00157           sum11a = _daddsp(sum11a, sum11b);
00158           sum11a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum11a),-_hif(sum11a)));
00159           // next column
00160           pRegC += (stepC-2);
00161           // c[0,2]
00162           sum02a = _daddsp(sum02a, sum02b);
00163           sum02a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum02a),-_hif(sum02a)));
00164           // c[1,2]
00165           sum12a = _daddsp(sum12a, sum12b);
00166           sum12a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum12a),-_hif(sum12a)));
00167           // next column
00168           pRegC += (stepC-2);
00169           // c[0,3]
00170           sum03a = _daddsp(sum03a, sum03b);
00171           sum03a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum03a),-_hif(sum03a)));
00172           // c[1,3]
00173           sum13a = _daddsp(sum13a, sum13b);
00174           sum13a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum13a),-_hif(sum13a)));
00175 
00176           pRegA = (__float2_t *) (pA+k*M_KERNEL_C);
00177           // load the 2x2 lower triangular inverse matrix
00178           a00 = pRegA[0];
00179           a10 = pRegA[1];
00180 
00181           a11 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_C+1];
00182 
00183           // 2x2 matrix multiply followed by saving
00184           pRegB = (__float2_t *) (pB+k*N_KERNEL_C);
00185           pRegBH = (__float2_t *) (pBHat+k);
00186           pRegC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00187 
00188           // update c[0,0]
00189           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum00a);
00190           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00191           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00192           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00193           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00194           *pRegB = tempd;
00195           // update c[1,0]
00196           temp128 = _cmpysp(a10,sum00a);
00197           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00198           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum10a);
00199           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00200           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00201           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00202           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00203           *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_C) = tempd;
00204 
00205           // next column
00206           pRegC += (stepC-2);
00207       pRegBH += (KPARTITION_C-2);
00208       pRegB++;
00209           // update c[0,1]
00210           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum01a);
00211           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00212           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00213           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00214           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00215           *pRegB = tempd;
00216           // update c[1,1]
00217           temp128 = _cmpysp(a10,sum01a);
00218           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00219           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum11a);
00220           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00221           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00222           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00223           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00224           *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_C) = tempd;
00225 
00226           // next column
00227           pRegC += (stepC-2);
00228       pRegBH += (KPARTITION_C-2);
00229       pRegB++;
00230           // update c[0,2]
00231           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum02a);
00232           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00233           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00234           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00235           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00236           *pRegB = tempd;
00237           // update c[1,2]
00238           temp128 = _cmpysp(a10,sum02a);
00239           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00240           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum12a);
00241           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00242           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00243           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00244           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00245           *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_C) = tempd;
00246 
00247           // next column
00248           pRegC += (stepC-2);
00249       pRegBH += (KPARTITION_C-2);
00250       pRegB++;
00251           // update c[0,3]
00252           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum03a);
00253           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00254           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00255           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00256           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00257           *pRegB = tempd;
00258           // update c[1,3]
00259           temp128 = _cmpysp(a10,sum03a);
00260           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00261           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum13a);
00262           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00263           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00264           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00265           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00266           *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_C) = tempd;
00267 
00268         }
00269         else // upper triangular
00270         {
00271           // read and update 2x4 matrix
00272           pRegC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00273           // c[0,0]
00274           sum00a = _daddsp(sum00a, sum00b);
00275           sum00a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum00a),-_hif(sum00a)));
00276           // c[1,0]
00277           sum10a = _daddsp(sum10a, sum10b);
00278           sum10a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum10a),-_hif(sum10a)));
00279           // next column
00280           pRegC += (stepC-2);
00281           // c[0,1]
00282           sum01a = _daddsp(sum01a, sum01b);
00283           sum01a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum01a),-_hif(sum01a)));
00284           // c[1,1]
00285           sum11a = _daddsp(sum11a, sum11b);
00286           sum11a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum11a),-_hif(sum11a)));
00287           // next column
00288           pRegC += (stepC-2);
00289           // c[0,2]
00290           sum02a = _daddsp(sum02a, sum02b);
00291           sum02a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum02a),-_hif(sum02a)));
00292           // c[1,2]
00293           sum12a = _daddsp(sum12a, sum12b);
00294           sum12a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum12a),-_hif(sum12a)));
00295           // next column
00296           pRegC += (stepC-2);
00297           // c[0,3]
00298           sum03a = _daddsp(sum03a, sum03b);
00299           sum03a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum03a),-_hif(sum03a)));
00300           // c[1,3]
00301           sum13a = _daddsp(sum13a, sum13b);
00302           sum13a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum13a),-_hif(sum13a)));
00303 
00304           pRegA = (__float2_t *) (pA-M_KERNEL_C*M_KERNEL_C);
00305           // load the 2x2 lower triangular inverse matrix
00306           a00 = pRegA[0];
00307 
00308           a01 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_C];
00309           a11 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_C+1];
00310 
00311           // 2x2 matrix multiply followed by saving
00312           pRegB = (__float2_t *) (pB-M_KERNEL_C*N_KERNEL_C);
00313           pRegBH = (__float2_t *) (pBHat-M_KERNEL_C);
00314           pRegC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00315 
00316           // update c[0,0]
00317           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum00a);
00318           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00319           temp128 = _cmpysp(a01,sum10a);
00320           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00321           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00322           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00323           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00324           *pRegB = tempd;
00325           // update c[1,0]
00326           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum10a);
00327           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00328           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00329           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00330           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00331           *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_C) = tempd;
00332 
00333           // next column
00334           pRegC += (stepC-2);
00335       pRegBH += (KPARTITION_C-2);
00336       pRegB++;
00337       // update c[0,1]
00338           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum01a);
00339           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00340           temp128 = _cmpysp(a01,sum11a);
00341           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00342           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00343           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00344           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00345           *pRegB = tempd;
00346           // update c[1,1]
00347           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum11a);
00348           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00349           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00350           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00351           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00352           *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_C) = tempd;
00353 
00354           // next column
00355           pRegC += (stepC-2);
00356       pRegBH += (KPARTITION_C-2);
00357       pRegB++;
00358           // update c[0,2]
00359           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum02a);
00360           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00361           temp128 = _cmpysp(a01,sum12a);
00362           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00363           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00364           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00365           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00366           *pRegB = tempd;
00367           // update c[1,2]
00368           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum12a);
00369           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00370           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00371           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00372           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00373           *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_C) = tempd;
00374 
00375           // next column
00376           pRegC += (stepC-2);
00377       pRegBH += (KPARTITION_C-2);
00378       pRegB++;
00379           // update c[0,3]
00380           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum03a);
00381           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00382           temp128 = _cmpysp(a01,sum13a);
00383           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00384           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00385           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00386           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00387           *pRegB = tempd;
00388           // update c[1,3]
00389           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum13a);
00390           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00391           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00392           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00393           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00394           *(pRegB+N_KERNEL_C) = tempd;
00395         }
00396   }
00397   else if(flagisN == 0)  // final saving in transpose form
00398   {
00399         if(flagisL) // lower triangular
00400         {
00401           // read and update 2x4 matrix
00402           pRegC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00403           // c[0,0]
00404           sum00a = _daddsp(sum00a, sum00b);
00405           sum00a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum00a),-_hif(sum00a)));
00406           // c[0,1]
00407           sum01a = _daddsp(sum01a, sum01b);
00408           sum01a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum01a),-_hif(sum01a)));
00409           // c[0,2]
00410           sum02a = _daddsp(sum02a, sum02b);
00411           sum02a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum02a),-_hif(sum02a)));
00412           // c[0,3]
00413           sum03a = _daddsp(sum03a, sum03b);
00414           sum03a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum03a),-_hif(sum03a)));
00415           // next column
00416           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00417           // c[1,0]
00418           sum10a = _daddsp(sum10a, sum10b);
00419           sum10a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum10a),-_hif(sum10a)));
00420           // c[1,1]
00421           sum11a = _daddsp(sum11a, sum11b);
00422           sum11a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum11a),-_hif(sum11a)));
00423           // c[1,2]
00424           sum12a = _daddsp(sum12a, sum12b);
00425           sum12a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum12a),-_hif(sum12a)));
00426           // c[1,3]
00427           sum13a = _daddsp(sum13a, sum13b);
00428           sum13a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum13a),-_hif(sum13a)));
00429 
00430           pRegA = (__float2_t *) (pA+k*M_KERNEL_C);
00431           // load the 2x2 lower triangular inverse matrix
00432           a00 = pRegA[0];
00433           a10 = pRegA[1];
00434 
00435           a11 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_C+1];
00436 
00437           // 2x2 matrix multiply followed by saving
00438           pRegB = (__float2_t *) (pB+k*N_KERNEL_C);
00439           pRegBH = (__float2_t *) (pBHat+k*NPARTITION_C);
00440           pRegC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00441 
00442           // update c[0,0]
00443           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum00a);
00444           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00445           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00446           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00447           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00448           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00449           // update c[0,1]
00450           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum01a);
00451           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00452           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00453           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00454           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00455           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00456           // update c[0,2]
00457           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum02a);
00458           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00459           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00460           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00461           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00462           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00463           // update c[0,3]
00464           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum03a);
00465           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00466           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00467           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00468           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00469           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00470 
00471           // next column
00472           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00473       pRegBH += (NPARTITION_C-4);
00474           // update c[1,0]
00475           temp128 = _cmpysp(a10,sum00a);
00476           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00477           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum10a);
00478           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00479           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00480           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00481           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00482           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00483           // update c[1,1]
00484           temp128 = _cmpysp(a10,sum01a);
00485           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00486           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum11a);
00487           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00488           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00489           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00490           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00491           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00492 
00493           // update c[0,2]
00494           temp128 = _cmpysp(a10,sum02a);
00495           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00496           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum12a);
00497           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00498           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00499           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00500           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00501           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00502           // update c[1,3]
00503           temp128 = _cmpysp(a10,sum03a);
00504           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00505           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum13a);
00506           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00507           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00508           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00509           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00510           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00511 
00512         }
00513         else // upper triangular
00514         {
00515           // read and update 2x4 matrix
00516           pRegC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00517           // c[0,0]
00518           sum00a = _daddsp(sum00a, sum00b);
00519           sum00a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum00a),-_hif(sum00a)));
00520           // c[0,1]
00521           sum01a = _daddsp(sum01a, sum01b);
00522           sum01a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum01a),-_hif(sum01a)));
00523           // c[0,2]
00524           sum02a = _daddsp(sum02a, sum02b);
00525           sum02a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum02a),-_hif(sum02a)));
00526           // c[0,3]
00527           sum03a = _daddsp(sum03a, sum03b);
00528           sum03a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum03a),-_hif(sum03a)));
00529           // next column
00530           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00531           // c[1,0]
00532           sum10a = _daddsp(sum10a, sum10b);
00533           sum10a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum10a),-_hif(sum10a)));
00534           // c[1,1]
00535           sum11a = _daddsp(sum11a, sum11b);
00536           sum11a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum11a),-_hif(sum11a)));
00537           // c[1,2]
00538           sum12a = _daddsp(sum12a, sum12b);
00539           sum12a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum12a),-_hif(sum12a)));
00540           // c[1,3]
00541           sum13a = _daddsp(sum13a, sum13b);
00542           sum13a = _dsubsp((*pRegC++),_ftof2(_lof(sum13a),-_hif(sum13a)));
00543 
00544           pRegA = (__float2_t *) (pA-M_KERNEL_C*M_KERNEL_C);
00545           // load the 2x2 lower triangular inverse matrix
00546           a00 = pRegA[0];
00547 
00548           a01 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_C];
00549           a11 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_C+1];
00550 
00551           // 2x2 matrix multiply followed by saving
00552           pRegB = (__float2_t *) (pB-M_KERNEL_C*N_KERNEL_C);
00553           pRegBH = (__float2_t *) (pBHat-M_KERNEL_C*NPARTITION_C);
00554           pRegC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00555 
00556           // update c[0,0]
00557           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum00a);
00558           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00559           temp128 = _cmpysp(a01,sum10a);
00560           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00561           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00562           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00563           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00564           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00565           // update c[0,1]
00566           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum01a);
00567           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00568           temp128 = _cmpysp(a01,sum11a);
00569           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00570           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00571           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00572           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00573           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00574 
00575       // update c[0,2]
00576           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum02a);
00577           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00578           temp128 = _cmpysp(a01,sum12a);
00579           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00580           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00581           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00582           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00583           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00584           // update c[0,3]
00585           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum03a);
00586           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00587           temp128 = _cmpysp(a01,sum13a);
00588           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00589           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00590           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00591           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00592           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00593 
00594           // next column
00595           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00596       pRegBH += (NPARTITION_C-4);
00597           // update c[1,0]
00598           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum10a);
00599           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00600           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00601           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00602           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00603           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00604           // update c[1,1]
00605           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum11a);
00606           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00607           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00608           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00609           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00610           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00611           // update c[1,2]
00612           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum12a);
00613           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00614           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00615           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00616           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00617           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00618           // update c[1,3]
00619           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum13a);
00620           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00621           tempd   = _ftof2(_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00622           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00623           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00624           *pRegB++ = tempd;
00625         }
00626   }
00627   else  // final saving in conjugate transpose form
00628   {
00629         if(flagisL) // lower triangular
00630         {
00631           // read and update 2x4 matrix
00632           pRegC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00633           // c[0,0]
00634           regC = *pRegC++;
00635           sum00a = _daddsp(sum00a, sum00b);
00636           sum00a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum00a),-_hif(sum00a)));
00637           // c[0,1]
00638           regC = *pRegC++;
00639           sum01a = _daddsp(sum01a, sum01b);
00640           sum01a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum01a),-_hif(sum01a)));
00641           // c[0,2]
00642           regC = *pRegC++;
00643           sum02a = _daddsp(sum02a, sum02b);
00644           sum02a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum02a),-_hif(sum02a)));
00645           // c[0,3]
00646           regC = *pRegC++;
00647           sum03a = _daddsp(sum03a, sum03b);
00648           sum03a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum03a),-_hif(sum03a)));
00649           // next column
00650           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00651           // c[1,0]
00652           regC = *pRegC++;
00653           sum10a = _daddsp(sum10a, sum10b);
00654           sum10a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum10a),-_hif(sum10a)));
00655           // c[1,1]
00656           regC = *pRegC++;
00657           sum11a = _daddsp(sum11a, sum11b);
00658           sum11a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum11a),-_hif(sum11a)));
00659           // c[1,2]
00660           regC = *pRegC++;
00661           sum12a = _daddsp(sum12a, sum12b);
00662           sum12a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum12a),-_hif(sum12a)));
00663           // c[1,3]
00664           regC = *pRegC++;
00665           sum13a = _daddsp(sum13a, sum13b);
00666           sum13a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum13a),-_hif(sum13a)));
00667 
00668           pRegA = (__float2_t *) (pA+k*M_KERNEL_C);
00669           // load the 2x2 lower triangular inverse matrix
00670           a00 = pRegA[0];
00671           a10 = pRegA[1];
00672 
00673           a11 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_C+1];
00674 
00675           // 2x2 matrix multiply followed by saving
00676           pRegB = (__float2_t *) (pB+k*N_KERNEL_C);
00677           pRegBH = (__float2_t *) (pBHat+k*NPARTITION_C);
00678           pRegC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00679 
00680           // update c[0,0]
00681           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum00a);
00682           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00683           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00684           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00685           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00686           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00687           // update c[0,1]
00688           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum01a);
00689           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00690           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00691           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00692           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00693           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00694           // update c[0,2]
00695           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum02a);
00696           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00697           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00698           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00699           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00700           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00701           // update c[0,3]
00702           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum03a);
00703           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00704           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00705           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00706           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00707           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00708 
00709           // next column
00710           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00711       pRegBH += (NPARTITION_C-4);
00712           // update c[1,0]
00713           temp128 = _cmpysp(a10,sum00a);
00714           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00715           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum10a);
00716           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00717           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00718           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00719           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00720           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00721           // update c[1,1]
00722           temp128 = _cmpysp(a10,sum01a);
00723           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00724           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum11a);
00725           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00726           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00727           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00728           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00729           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00730 
00731           // update c[0,2]
00732           temp128 = _cmpysp(a10,sum02a);
00733           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00734           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum12a);
00735           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00736           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00737           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00738           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00739           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00740           // update c[1,3]
00741           temp128 = _cmpysp(a10,sum03a);
00742           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00743           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum13a);
00744           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00745           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00746           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00747           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00748           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00749 
00750         }
00751         else // upper triangular
00752         {
00753           // read and update 2x4 matrix
00754           pRegC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00755           // c[0,0]
00756           regC = *pRegC++;
00757           sum00a = _daddsp(sum00a, sum00b);
00758           sum00a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum00a),-_hif(sum00a)));
00759           // c[0,1]
00760           regC = *pRegC++;
00761           sum01a = _daddsp(sum01a, sum01b);
00762           sum01a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum01a),-_hif(sum01a)));
00763           // c[0,2]
00764           regC = *pRegC++;
00765           sum02a = _daddsp(sum02a, sum02b);
00766           sum02a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum02a),-_hif(sum02a)));
00767           // c[0,3]
00768           regC = *pRegC++;
00769           sum03a = _daddsp(sum03a, sum03b);
00770           sum03a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum03a),-_hif(sum03a)));
00771           // next column
00772           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00773           // c[1,0]
00774           regC = *pRegC++;
00775           sum10a = _daddsp(sum10a, sum10b);
00776           sum10a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum10a),-_hif(sum10a)));
00777           // c[1,1]
00778           regC = *pRegC++;
00779           sum11a = _daddsp(sum11a, sum11b);
00780           sum11a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum11a),-_hif(sum11a)));
00781           // c[1,2]
00782           regC = *pRegC++;
00783           sum12a = _daddsp(sum12a, sum12b);
00784           sum12a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum12a),-_hif(sum12a)));
00785           // c[1,3]
00786           regC = *pRegC++;
00787           sum13a = _daddsp(sum13a, sum13b);
00788           sum13a = _dsubsp(_ftof2(-_hif(regC),_lof(regC)),_ftof2(_lof(sum13a),-_hif(sum13a)));
00789 
00790           pRegA = (__float2_t *) (pA-M_KERNEL_C*M_KERNEL_C);
00791           // load the 2x2 lower triangular inverse matrix
00792           a00 = pRegA[0];
00793 
00794           a01 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_C];
00795           a11 = pRegA[M_KERNEL_C+1];
00796 
00797           // 2x2 matrix multiply followed by saving
00798           pRegB = (__float2_t *) (pB-M_KERNEL_C*N_KERNEL_C);
00799           pRegBH = (__float2_t *) (pBHat-M_KERNEL_C*NPARTITION_C);
00800           pRegC = (__float2_t *) pC;
00801 
00802           // update c[0,0]
00803           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum00a);
00804           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00805           temp128 = _cmpysp(a01,sum10a);
00806           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00807           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00808           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00809           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00810           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00811           // update c[0,1]
00812           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum01a);
00813           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00814           temp128 = _cmpysp(a01,sum11a);
00815           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00816           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00817           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00818           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00819           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00820 
00821       // update c[0,2]
00822           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum02a);
00823           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00824           temp128 = _cmpysp(a01,sum12a);
00825           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00826           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00827           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00828           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00829           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00830           // update c[0,3]
00831           temp128 = _cmpysp(a00,sum03a);
00832           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00833           temp128 = _cmpysp(a01,sum13a);
00834           tempd   = _daddsp(tempd,_daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128)));
00835           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00836           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00837           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00838           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00839 
00840           // next column
00841           pRegC += (stepC-4);
00842       pRegBH += (NPARTITION_C-4);
00843           // update c[1,0]
00844           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum10a);
00845           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00846           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00847           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00848           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00849           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00850           // update c[1,1]
00851           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum11a);
00852           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00853           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00854           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00855           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00856           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00857           // update c[1,2]
00858           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum12a);
00859           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00860           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00861           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00862           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00863           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00864           // update c[1,3]
00865           temp128 = _cmpysp(a11,sum13a);
00866           tempd   = _daddsp(_lof2_128(temp128),_hif2_128(temp128));
00867           tempd   = _ftof2(-_lof(tempd),-_hif(tempd));
00868           *pRegC++ = tempd;
00869           *pRegBH++ = tempd;
00870           *pRegB++ = _ftof2(-_hif(tempd),_lof(tempd));
00871         }
00872   }
00873           return;
00874 } // ctrsmKernel()
